title: AI Customer Support Agent
subtitle: Resolve tickets faster with intelligent automation and 24/7 availability
description: Deploy AI agents that handle common customer inquiries, escalate complex issues to human agents, and maintain your brand voice across email, chat, and social channels.

benefits.title: Instant Ticket Triage
benefits.description: AI classifies incoming tickets by urgency, category (billing, technical, account), and sentiment—routing each to the right team automatically.

benefits.title: Automated Resolutions
benefits.description: Handle password resets, order status inquiries, FAQ questions, and basic troubleshooting without human intervention.

benefits.title: Multilingual Support
benefits.description: Communicate with customers in 50+ languages with context-aware translations that preserve technical accuracy and brand tone.

benefits.title: Seamless Escalation
benefits.description: When AI can't resolve an issue, it summarizes the conversation, gathers relevant data, and hands off to a human agent with full context.

features.title: Intelligent Chatbots
features.description: Deploy AI chat agents on your website that answer questions, guide users through processes, and collect information before escalating.

features.title: Email Auto-Response
features.description: Generate contextual email replies based on ticket content, customer history, and your knowledge base—maintaining consistent quality.

features.title: Smart Routing
features.description: Analyze ticket content to identify urgency signals, technical keywords, and customer tier—then route to specialists instantly.

features.title: Sentiment Analysis
features.description: Detect frustrated or angry customers in real-time and prioritize their tickets or trigger manager alerts for immediate intervention.

features.title: 24/7 Availability
features.description: Provide instant responses outside business hours, reducing customer wait times and improving satisfaction scores.

features.title: Knowledge Base Integration
features.description: AI learns from your help docs, past tickets, and product documentation to provide accurate, company-specific answers.

useCases.title: E-commerce Order Support
useCases.description: Automatically handle order tracking, return requests, shipping updates, and simple product questions—resolving 60% of tickets without human touch.

useCases.title: SaaS Technical Troubleshooting
useCases.description: Guide users through common setup issues, password resets, and feature questions using step-by-step instructions from your knowledge base.

useCases.title: Social Media Monitoring
useCases.description: Detect customer complaints on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram—then respond with helpful solutions or escalate to your social team with context.

metrics.efficiency: 60% of tickets resolved without human intervention
